topic.title: Managing Comments in a WebHelp with Feedback System

keywords.indexterm: WebHelp with Feedback comment managementmanage comments

body.p: As an administrator, you have access to manage comments posted in your feedback-enabled WebHelp system. You can also manage user roles and configure notification options.

To manage comments, user roles, or notification options, follow these steps:
At the bottom of each specific topic there is a Comments navigation bar and on the right side there is a Log in button. Click this button and log in with your administrator credentials. This gives you access to an Admin button.
Click the Admin button to display an administrative interface inside the topic.
Use this panel to manage comments, user roles, or notification options.
The following options are available:
body.note: The key used for identifying the page a comment belongs to is the relative file path to the output page (starting from the WebHelp project root). Since the output file and folder names mirror the source, any change to the file name (or its folder) in the source will affect the comments attached to that WebHelp page. Changes to the topic ID does not affect the comments.
